results.question: In June 2017, Saudi Arabia and Egypt broke off ties with which country over its supposed support for terrorism?
Which of the following United States Presidents served the shortest term in office?
Which of these was an official candidate in the 2017 British General Election?
Which letter do you need to have on a European driver license in order to ride any motorbikes?
What year did the effort to deploy the Common Core State Standards (CCSS) in the US begin?
Which Native American tribe/nation requires at least one half blood quantum (equivalent to one parent) to be eligible for membership?
Which US state was the first to allow women to vote in 1869?
Starting from 2000, China banned manufacturing and sales of all video game consoles. On which year was this ban lifted?
Which of the following United States senators is known for performing a 24-hour long filibuster?
What is centralism?
results.correct_answer: Concentration of power and authority in a central organization.
incorrect_answers: Conforming to one single common political agenda.
The grey area in the spectrum of political left and right.
